## Data Organisation

```{r}
df <- read.csv("AAIPS_data.csv")
names(df)

df <- df %>%
  mutate(
    ResAnioMes = as.numeric(paste0(year(fechaResolucionClean), sprintf("%02d", month(fechaResolucionClean)))),
    TraAnioMes = as.numeric(paste0(year(fechaTramiteClean), sprintf("%02d", month(fechaTramiteClean)))),
    tiempoRes = difftime(fechaResolucionClean,fechaTramiteClean, units = "days"),
    anioTra = as.numeric(year(fechaTramiteClean)),
    mesTra =as.numeric(month(fechaTramiteClean))
  )
summary_table <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(anioTra)) %>%
  group_by(anioTra) %>%
  summarise(
    min = min(as.numeric(tiempoRes), na.rm = TRUE),
    max = max(as.numeric(tiempoRes), na.rm = TRUE),
    avg = mean(as.numeric(tiempoRes), na.rm = TRUE)
  )
summary_table

min_df <- aggregate(as.numeric(tiempoRes) ~ anioTra, data = df, FUN = min, na.rm = TRUE)
max_df <- aggregate(as.numeric(tiempoRes) ~ anioTra, data = df, FUN = max, na.rm = TRUE)
avg_df <- aggregate(as.numeric(tiempoRes) ~ anioTra, data = df, FUN = mean, na.rm = TRUE)

# Rename columns
colnames(min_df)[2] <- "min"
colnames(max_df)[2] <- "max"
colnames(avg_df)[2] <- "avg"

# Merge all three
summary_table <- Reduce(function(x, y) merge(x, y, by = "anioTra"), list(min_df, max_df, avg_df))

  # Estudio sobre los tiempos de resolución de trámites de AAIPS
# Relación con razón social, fracción arancelaria, año, etc.

result_df <- df %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    !is.na(anioTra)
    # !is.na(tiempoRes)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(
                 TraAnioMes,
                 anioTra,
                 mesTra
                 ) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    tramites = n(),
    min = min(as.numeric(tiempoRes), na.rm = TRUE),
    max = max(as.numeric(tiempoRes), na.rm = TRUE),
    avg = mean(as.numeric(tiempoRes), na.rm = TRUE)
  )  
  
result_df


g <- ggplot(result_df, aes(x = as.POSIXct(mesTra, format = "%m"), y = as.numeric(tramites), 
                           group = as.character(anioTra), 
                           color = as.character(anioTra))) +
  geom_line(linewidth = 1) +                          # Add a line with grouping by anioTra
  geom_point(size = 2) +                              # Points for visibility
  labs(
    title = "Evolución de Avisos Solicitados por Periodo",
    x = "Mes",
    y = "Cantidad de Avisos",
    color = "Año de Trámite"
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(n.breaks=12) +
  scale_y_continuous(n.breaks = 10) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +                     # Minimal clean theme
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),  # Center and bold the title
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),      # Rotate x-axis labels for readability
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),                     # Remove minor grid lines
    legend.position = "top"                                 # Position the legend at the top
  )

# Print the plot
print(g)

# Prepare data for plotting
plot_df <- result_df %>%
  select(TraAnioMes, min, avg, max, anioTra, mesTra) %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = c(min, avg, max),
               names_to = "Stat",
               values_to = "Tiempo")

# Annual averages for horizontal lines
avg_lines <- result_df %>%
  group_by(anioTra) %>%
  summarise(anual_avg = mean(avg, na.rm = TRUE))

# Plot
ggplot(plot_df, aes(x = mesTra, 
                    y = Tiempo,
                    color = Stat,
                    shape = Stat,
                    group = Stat)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +
  geom_hline(data = avg_lines,
             aes(yintercept = anual_avg),
             linetype = "dashed",
             color = "black") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 50)) +
  labs(
    x = "Periodo",
    y = "Tiempo de Resolución (días)",
    shape = "",
    color = "",
    title = "Tiempos mensuales con promedio anual"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),
    legend.position = "right",
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~anioTra, scales = "free_y")
```

## Tiempo de resolución de trámites

```{r}
diasTramite <- df %>%
  # filter(grepl("Charos", RAZÓN.SOCIAL, ignore.case = TRUE)) %>%
  group_by(
    tiempoRes,
    # TraAnioMes
  ) %>%
  summarise(
    obs = n()
  )

diasTramite %>%
  kbl() %>%
  kableExtra::kable_classic()

df %>%
  filter(!is.na(tiempoRes)) %>%
  mutate(tiempoRes = as.numeric(tiempoRes)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = tiempoRes)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 1, fill = "steelblue", color = "white") +
  scale_x_continuous(n.breaks = 45) +
  labs(
    title = "Distribución de Tiempos de Resolución",
    x = "Tiempo de Resolución (días)",
    y = "Número de Observaciones"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5, face = "bold"),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)
  )
```
### Análisis de boxplot
```{r}

# Make sure tiempoRes is numeric and filter NA values
df_clean <- df %>%
  filter(!is.na(TraAnioMes), !is.na(tiempoRes)) %>%
  mutate(tiempoRes = as.numeric(tiempoRes))

# Plot quantiles using boxplots
ggplot(df_clean, aes(x = as.factor(mesTra), 
                     y = tiempoRes,
                     group = TraAnioMes,
                     color =as.factor(mesTra))) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 15)) +
  labs(
    title = "Distribución de Tiempo de Resolución por Periodo",
    x = "Mes",
    y = "Tiempo de Resolución (días)"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 14) +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1),legend.position = "top"
  ) +
  facet_wrap(~anioTra)
```

```{r}
companias <- combined_df %>%
  group_by(razonSocial) %>%
  summarise(
    AAIPS = n(),
    volumenTotalTons = sum(as.numeric(volumenAvisoTIGIE), na.rm = TRUE) / 1000,
    tiempoAutorizacion = mean(tiempoRes),
    topFracciones = paste(
      unique(fraccionArancelaria)[1:min(2, length(unique(fraccionArancelaria)))],
      collapse = ", "
    )
  ) %>%
  arrange(desc(AAIPS))

companias[c(1:10), ] %>%
```
